channel.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mid19Ey.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://infinity-edge.com/"][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Website ||[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL][URL=http://"http://infinity-edge.com/forum"] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Forum ||[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL] [URL=http://"http://infinity-edge.com/Infinity-Edge.jar"][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Play[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL] [b]Infinity-Edge[/b] is a highly advanced, well-established Runescape Private Server with a huge amount of flawless content . Online 24/7, hosted on a dedicated server, It will blow your mind with its amazing skilling, economy and PKing with over 20 minigames and bosses to defeat! It is a 748 revision server, which means it's probably a more recent and modern server than another RSPS you may have played. Players are rewarded daily for voting, and there are many donator benefits![/CENTER]
FEATURES
[B]PRESTIGE SYSTEM[/B] EVERY PRESTIGE YOU EARN + 5 OR 10 PERMANENT HP AND PRESTIGE POINTS USED TO BUY COOL AND AWESOME ITEMS ON PRESTIGE SHOP YOU CAN DECIDE IF YOU WANT ALL SKILLS OR COMBAT ONLY TO PRESTIGE.
[B]LOTTERY[/B] YOU CAN JOIN LOTTERY BY PURCHASING TICKET AT LOTTERY STORE LOCATED AT HOME WORTH 1.1M 1 TICKET WILL INCREASE THE POT TO 20M WHEN THE POT REACHED 20 M IT WILL CHOOSE TO ALL WHO JOIN THE LOTTERY.
[B]PVM POINTS[/B] EVERY MONSTER NPC/BOSS YOU KILLED YOU WILL RECIEVE 1 PVM POINTS THAT YOU CAN USE TO BUY COOL PVM OUTFITS,ARMOR EVEN WEAPONS.
ALL SKILLS TRAINABLE PLAYER OWNED HOUSE, DUNGEONEERING , PURO PURO , ARTISANS WORK SHOP ,
-Prestige System - Starter Packs - Loyalty Points (Auras) - Fist of Guthix Tokens (Pking Rewards) - Crystal Chest (Treasure Trail Items,Animal Masks,Mobilising Armies Robes) - Squeal of Fortune - Vote For Spins - Highscores - Friends List - Private Chat - Commands - 120/120 All skills - 169 Combat level - Hairdresser - Makeovers
Dungeons - Kuradals Dungeon - Jadinko Lair - Polypore Dungeon - Cave Horror Dungeon - Glacor's Dungeon - Ice Strykwyrms dungeon
Bosses - Bandos Godwars - Zamorak Godwars - Armadyl Godwars - Saradomin Godwars - King Black Dragon - Queen Black Dragon - Corporeal Beast - Tormented Demons - Nex - Barrows - Party Demon - Blink - Mercenary Mage - Bork - Sunsfreet - Donkeykong - Skill Capes - Special Attacks - Donator Zone - Max Cape - Completionist Cape - Own house Construction - Unique thieving system
- Wilderness (PKing) - Clan Wars ( White/Red/Purple portal) - Fight Caves (Fire Cape) - Barrows - Fight Kiln (Tokhaar-Kal) - Castle Wars - Dominion Tower - Runespan - Puro Puro - Artisans workshop - Zombie minigames - JAD -Soulwars -Rise of the Six
and ALOT MORE!
[B]Players Statistic[/B] You can checks anyone account information [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Q4y4qFG.png[/img]
[B]Vorago Vorago is just one of the 20+ Boss you can fight on Infinity-Edge[/B] PVMing is Fun on Infinity-Edge [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bAuOOck.png[/img]
[B]Soulwars[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xRIAWrZ.png[/img]
Onspot Duel You can challenge anyone,everywhere Friendly or Stake DUEL [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/38NX1nD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4ylwf3B.png[/img]
[B]Player own Store[/B] Our Player-Owned-Shops give you the ability to sell what you want at your own price, isntead of selling it to the store for a fixed amount. Anyone can use them at any time. They can be accessed by other players when they right-click you.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lC4M8fH.png[/img]
Compcape Req [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Fowz5bd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xnegt1K.jpg[/img]
[B]Puro-Puro[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/11hco7O.png[/img]
[B]Rise of th Six [/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DzrIV3H.png[/img]
[B]It's a new public released server everyone so don't be afraid to come check us out! We're a Eco server building a great community. The advertisement speaks big, but if you want to really feel it, come join in for an hour and see how you like it here, you won't regret it [/B]
[URL=http://"http://infinity-edge.com/"][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Website[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL][URL=http://"http://infinity-edge.com/forum"] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Forum[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL] [URL=http://"http://infinity-edge.com/Infinity-Edge.jar"][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Play[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL]

item.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

minor updates only
Removed Border Guard ATM Due to Bug not yet fixed thank you to the one who report this
added Maxed Shop
Exclusive Store for Completionist and Maxed players.
Maxed store is under construction still need of suggestion what to add on that store

Compcapse store
agile set
lumber jack set
warrior guild mining set
all skills necklase (not yet done ill add XP increase for on each necklase)
fixed prestige saying 1 point for combat and 3 points for all skills
prestige is 3 for combat and 10 for all skills

Also this is cash shop at prestige only 1 prestige for you to open this
boxes are
saradomin lg/sk
guthix lg/sk
zammorak lg/sk
rock crabs armour

Read full topic

item.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
item.dc:creator: @rune-destiny rune-destiny
item.description:
@rune-destiny wrote:

Batch 2 was released today of the boss pets. They include:
Dharok I
Verac I
Ahrim I
Guthan I All 1/200 ea.
Torag I
Karil I
Daggonoth Supreme
Daggonoth Prime
Daggonoth Rex (unreleased in the game atm)
Chaos elemental (unreleased in the game atm)
Pest Queen 1/200

I have updated the drop chance of the GWD pets to be slightly more common. ~ 1/200 still
I have fixed an issue involving ROTS, and fixed the items received from it as well.
Fixed a bug involving pets…
Fixed a bug involving involuntary disconnections via Kalphite Queen and barrows
Fixed a bug involving drop tables
Fixed a bug involving yells and admins.
Fixed a bug involving the prayer altar at home stealing bones occasionally…
Fixed a bug involving the casting of spells.

I have edited some stats on several items to be more realistic and removed several errors involving a few items.
BUCKETS…

Read full topic

item.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

Rise of the Six mini game improved.
Added drops to the barrows brothers. The pets are 1/700 per brother or roughly 1/116 for a pet.
Fixed the sea singer drop in ROTS.
Added an animation to Obliteration (To be updated tomorrow)
Added an animation to the Sea Singers Trident (To be updated/added tomorrow)
The attack added to Obliteration is called “Meteor” (picking a better name later)
(Hits once for a max hit of 200~ - 1,000 (depending on bonuses level potion effects and prayer).
The attack added to the Sea Singers Trident is called “Sirens Song”
(Hits twice for 90%/15% power each hit.)

Redid the drop system in order to make drops happen in a more fair way.
Fixed a potentially fatal bug with Graardor causing server crashes.
Fixed a potentially fatal bug with Mercenary Mage… causing server crashes.
Fixed problems involving the polypore staff.

Doing several item balances soon to make weapons… well not as broken. (To be discussed).

Read full topic

item.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
item.dc:creator: @rune-destiny rune-destiny
item.description:
@rune-destiny wrote:

Rise of the six received a much needed rework.
The Brothers no longer drop their pets.
The Rewards chest now has new items in it including level 85 Gloves.
The pets are handled through the chests instead of the brothers.
The rates were HEAVILY nerfed.
Sea Singer is being removed.
I will add something new to make up for it
The server will now announce when you get a pet/trident/ or the level 85 gloves.

Working on Donator only bosses.

Read full topic

Great server and community. Freshhhh

item.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
item.dc:creator: @rune-destiny rune-destiny
item.description:
@rune-destiny wrote:

Just a Minor/Small update

Ive been busy doing Videos weve just recently bought a software for video making
so far ive got 10 videos created .

Prestige system rewrite
everytime you prestige if you choose all combat you will get 15 prestige points
99 all skills 120 dungeoneering

you can choose combat only and it willgive you 1 prestige point

Max prestige called Master prestige is at 100th prestige
and everytime you prestige you will get a permanent HP + 20 every prestige.

Boss contract Added at every 5th contact youve finished it will give you a beer if you click it you will automaticaly teleport you to the new boss leuni that will drop drygores.

Currently working on Event task
that you can get some skilling outfit,
Quest Korasi
cooking quest
some fixes given to me.

Thank you
help me advertise guys

Read full topic

item.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

Updates and Fixes
Finally found whats the problem on cape customization and its fixed
Fixed onspot duel,wilderness bug Ty to worztide
removed ores,logs and dragon stuff at shops
added dragon stuff at mithril and iron dragons (mithril drop chance is higher than iron)
Temporarily remove Team Dungeoneering and FOG minigames
Finally Fixed Barrows

For content
New adventurers log

http://infinity-edge.com/advlog

check what your are doing and whats your status in highscores automatic updated when log out

Achievemetn system (Cosmetic only)
slayer
cooking
some boss

ull get a cosmetic armor

Talk to brenden for more info he almost got it all tough.

thats all i think
i forgot the other stuff ive done.

Guys its week end please help me do some advertisement, video ,threads
Please and thank you !!

Read full topic

@rune-destiny wrote:

Fixed Barrows
Added Barrows on Minigame Teleport
removed Trivia Shop and Statresetter multiple npcs at home
Fixed Trivia shop you can no longer buy Xp lamp if you dont have 150 triviapoints
Fxied Stat Resetter your items in inventory and armor will be put on bank if you will reset your stats.

Almost 80% on the new Donator Boss Sunsfreet
Will Drop Dragon Set (OR)
charms
dragonbones
and Dragon weapons and armor

ank recruiter to admin

item.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:550238”]Use or make another theme for the forum, it’s overused like crazy. In terms of the server, I suppose there’s some content that would be worth wanting to try out at least. For example, I’ve never tried the Rise of the Six minigame in RuneScape so I might be wiling to try that if I came online (personally never seen it on other communities).

Anyway, I wish for the best on the server and forum - good luck.[/quote]

Thank you and see yeah ingame

item.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Use or make another theme for the forum, it’s overused like crazy. In terms of the server, I suppose there’s some content that would be worth wanting to try out at least. For example, I’ve never tried the Rise of the Six minigame in RuneScape so I might be wiling to try that if I came online (personally never seen it on other communities).

Anyway, I wish for the best on the server and forum - good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: [Infinity-Edge] New RSPS February 2015
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

[CENTER]
[URL=http://“http://infinity-edge.com/”][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Website ||[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL][URL=http://“http://infinity-edge.com/forum”] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Forum ||[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL] [URL=http://“http://infinity-edge.com/Infinity-Edge.jar”][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Play[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL]
Infinity-Edge is a highly advanced, well-established Runescape Private Server with a huge amount of flawless content . Online 24/7, hosted on a dedicated server, It will blow your mind with its amazing skilling, economy and PKing with over 20 minigames and bosses to defeat! It is a 748 revision server, which means it’s probably a more recent and modern server than another RSPS you may have played. Players are rewarded daily for voting, and there are many donator benefits![/CENTER]

FEATURES

[B]PRESTIGE SYSTEM[/B]
EVERY PRESTIGE YOU EARN + 5 OR 10 PERMANENT HP AND PRESTIGE POINTS USED TO BUY COOL AND AWESOME ITEMS ON PRESTIGE SHOP
YOU CAN DECIDE IF YOU WANT ALL SKILLS OR COMBAT ONLY TO PRESTIGE.

[B]LOTTERY[/B]
YOU CAN JOIN LOTTERY BY PURCHASING TICKET AT LOTTERY STORE LOCATED AT HOME WORTH 1.1M
1 TICKET WILL INCREASE THE POT TO 20M WHEN THE POT REACHED 20 M IT WILL CHOOSE TO ALL WHO JOIN THE LOTTERY.

[B]PVM POINTS[/B]
EVERY MONSTER NPC/BOSS YOU KILLED YOU WILL RECIEVE 1 PVM POINTS THAT YOU CAN USE TO BUY COOL PVM OUTFITS,ARMOR EVEN WEAPONS.

ALL SKILLS TRAINABLE
PLAYER OWNED HOUSE, DUNGEONEERING , PURO PURO , ARTISANS WORK SHOP ,

-Prestige System

  • Starter Packs
  • Loyalty Points (Auras)
  • Fist of Guthix Tokens (Pking Rewards)
  • Crystal Chest (Treasure Trail Items,Animal Masks,Mobilising Armies Robes)
  • Squeal of Fortune
  • Vote For Spins
  • Highscores
  • Friends List
  • Private Chat
  • Commands
  • 120/120 All skills
  • 169 Combat level
  • Hairdresser
  • Makeovers

Dungeons

  • Kuradals Dungeon
  • Jadinko Lair
  • Polypore Dungeon
  • Cave Horror Dungeon
  • Glacor’s Dungeon
  • Ice Strykwyrms dungeon

Bosses

  • Bandos Godwars

  • Zamorak Godwars

  • Armadyl Godwars

  • Saradomin Godwars

  • King Black Dragon

  • Queen Black Dragon

  • Corporeal Beast

  • Tormented Demons

  • Nex

  • Barrows

  • Party Demon

  • Blink

  • Mercenary Mage

  • Bork

  • Sunsfreet

  • Donkeykong

  • Skill Capes

  • Special Attacks

  • Donator Zone

  • Max Cape

  • Completionist Cape

  • Own house Construction

  • Unique thieving system

  • Wilderness (PKing)

  • Clan Wars ( White/Red/Purple portal)

  • Fight Caves (Fire Cape)

  • Barrows

  • Fight Kiln (Tokhaar-Kal)

  • Castle Wars

  • Dominion Tower

  • Runespan

  • Puro Puro

  • Artisans workshop

  • Zombie minigames

  • JAD
    -Soulwars
    -Rise of the Six

and ALOT MORE!

[B]Players Statistic[/B]
You can checks anyone account information

[B]Vorago
Vorago is just one of the 20+ Boss you can fight on Infinity-Edge[/B]
PVMing is Fun on Infinity-Edge

[B]Soulwars[/B]

Onspot Duel
You can challenge anyone,everywhere
Friendly or Stake DUEL

[B]Player own Store[/B]
Our Player-Owned-Shops give you the ability to sell what you want at your own price, isntead of selling it to the store for a fixed amount. Anyone can use them at any time. They can be accessed by other players when they right-click you.

Compcape Req

[B]Puro-Puro[/B]

[B]Rise of th Six [/B]

[B]It’s a new public released server everyone so don’t be afraid to come check us out! We’re a Eco server building a great community. The advertisement speaks big, but if you want to really feel it, come join in for an hour and see how you like it here, you won’t regret it
[/B]
